document_data.name: ''Fured Kiuno of the Bear''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fured Kiuno of the Bear''''' was a set of [[enchanted]] [[hide armor]] made from the fur of [[Chultan moonbear]] and used by the adventurers of Chult in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Fured Kiuno of the Bear'' gave the wearer a boost to their offensive powers and abilities, increased their health and constitution, defense, and physical strength, and increased their chances of landing especially powerful and lucky attacks. All the powers that were believed to be a result of adorning the fur of a Chultan moonbear.
document_data.History: In the late 15{{th}} century DR, a strange and powerful [[polar bear]] found its way into the jungles outside the lost city of [[Omu]]. The beast, known as [[Polaris (bear)|Polaris]], was considered to be an impressive hunter's trophy to claim offered to various adventurers who ventured into Chult's jungles. As a reward for the beast's demise, the adventures were promised a ''Fured Kiuno of the Bear''.
